review_data.title: still excellent for lunch!

review_data.title: excellent for lunch
review_data.content: My first visit was with colleagues who recommended this restaurant. The lunchtiime menu was suitable for all tastes. Most of our group chose the schweinschnitzel which was delicious. Good value for money and freindly staff. Will definitely return.
